title: Danielle Lloyd stood up for Coleen Rooney because 'same thing happened to me'
text:

Danielle Lloyd says she had to speak out in the war between Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy because the same thing has happened to her.

Wayne Rooney and Jamie Vardy’s wives are at war since Coleen accused her of selling stories about her to a national newspaper.

Coleen, who has been nicknamed Wagatha Christie in the scandal, planted false stories on her private Instagram account and revealed in an epic statement that she'd blocked every account but Rebekah's from viewing her Stories to test whether or not the information would leak.

And when they did, she told the world what had happened in a bombshell statement that went viral.

(Image: Getty Images for Nickelodeon Sli)

Originally, Danielle, who shares sons Harry, Archie and George with her footballer ex-husband Jamie O’Hara, commented on Coleen's statement with three rat emojis.

She has since spoken out against Rebekah, claiming on This Morning to have had "run-ins" with her - which Becky has denied.

Speaking exclusively to Mirror Online at Nickelodeon's Slimefest at Blackpool Pleasure Beach, she explained why she felt she had to speak out.

Danielle, who also shares son Ronnie with husband Michael O'Neill, told us: "Obviously everybody is entitled to their opinion at the end of the day and I had my opinion and obviously she didn't like it but I feel like it was just the craziest thing that happened.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

"I didn't even say anything at the beginning I just put emojis and it just blew up. At the end of the day it’s just one of those things and it'll be old news next week. There'll be someone else."

Rebekah has vehemently denied leaking stories about Coleen and said in her own statement that it was "disgusting" that she even had to deny it, especially when she's heavily pregnant.

She was so upset that she cut her Dubai holiday short and flew back home.

Becky claimed she has hired a forensic IT expert to prove her innocence and is considering legal action.

(Image: PA)

But representatives for Coleen say she has irrefutable evidence that the leaks came from Rebekah's account.

Danielle added: "Maybe we might find out exactly what happened - who knows?

"I've had my own family members sell stories on me and it just divides the family and I would never speak to that person again.

"It's not nice, I've had it done to me and they full on knew what they were doing and they were like, 'Yeah it's me, I'm selling the story'.

"So for people to be selling stories on you and you don’t know who they are, it's not nice not knowing who you can trust."
description: EXCLUSIVE: Danielle Lloyd came to Coleen Rooney's defence amid her showdown with Rebekah Vardy - and says she's also had stories sold on her
